patthana16.91:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
patthana16.91:1.1_0: One whose teachings is not a cause of seeking.
patthana16.91:2.1_0: Without taking leave of an unitable teaching, not for the next.
patthana16.91:2.1_1: One who doesn’t take part in the way of deterioration to the teachings of another religion ...
patthana16.91:2.1_2: not the cause of ascetics and brahmins.
